Explodes into a cloud of interference that hinders visibility.

A familiar-looking weapon for bashing nearby opponents.

Thrown item.

depot.name: Respawn Beacon
depot.tooltip: SHOULDN'T BE USED

depot.name: Personal Holo-decoy
depot.tooltip: Makes a copy of you. Decoy is visible in normal view, not visible in HRV.

depot.name: Toxic Grenade Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Thrown item.
Explodes into a cloud of deadly gas that continuously damages and blinds your enemies.

depot.name: Ammunition Pod Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Tactical gear.
Use to place ammo refill crates for your allies.

depot.name: Barricade Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Tactical gear.
Equip to shield yourself from the front. Can be placed on the ground for stationary cover.

depot.name: Riot Shield
depot.tooltip:
Tactical gear.
Equip to shield yourself from the front.

depot.name: Combat Knife Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Melee item.
Stab enemies that get too close.

depot.name: Shock Grenade Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Thrown item.
Explodes when thrown, dealing damage to and blinds surrounding players.

depot.name: EMP Grenade Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Thrown item.
Explodes into an EMP that temporarily blinds enemies and shuts down hardsuits.

depot.name: Frag Grenade Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Thrown item.
An explosive grenade.

depot.tooltip:

depot.tooltip:
Tactical gear.
Use to heal yourself or your allies, or poison your enemies.

depot.name: HE Grenade Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Thrown item.
An extremely powerful explosive grenade.

depot.name: HRV Decoy Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Dropped item.
Generates a decoy that shows up on your enemies' HRV.

depot.name: HRV Blackout Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Dropped item.
Creates a field that hides friendly targets from HRV detection.

depot.name: Proximity Mine Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Dropped item.
Violently explodes when triggered by nearby enemies.

depot.name: Repair Tool
depot.tooltip:
Tactical gear.
Allows you to repair friendly mechanical targets.

depot.name: Combat Knife Mk.2
depot.tooltip:
Melee item.
Melee weapon with increased damage and a faster attack.

depot.name: Stun Mine Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Dropped item.
Stuns nearby enemies when triggered.

depot.name: Revival Injector Mk.1
depot.tooltip:
Tactical gear.
Use to revive downed teammates.

primary.name: Heavy Assault Rifle
primary.tooltip: The Heavy Assault Rifle may not be fast, but it makes up for it in sheer stopping power and range.

primary.name: LMG Recon
primary.tooltip: The lightweight machine gun reconnaissance has a quick reload speed, but very low accuracy and low rate of fire.

primary.name: Tactical SMG
primary.tooltip: The Tactical SMG offers an extremely high rate of fire and mobility with very little recoil, but with a high spread and reload speed.

primary.name: Burstfire SMG
primary.tooltip: The Burstfire SMG is a 4 round burstfire SMG.

primary.name: Anti-Materiel Rifle
primary.tooltip: The Anti-Materiel Rifle is instantly lethal at any range, but has a long reload time after every shot. No one man should have all this power!

primary.name: Bullpup Full Auto
primary.tooltip: The Bullpup Full Auto is lightweight and has strong short to mid-range stopping power, but is slow to reload.

primary.name: AK470 Rifle
primary.tooltip: The AK470 Rifle is a balanced weapon overall, offering moderate rate of fire with high stopping power.

primary.name: Compound Bow
primary.tooltip: A modernized classic compound bow made using that latest technology. Stealthy and effective for those that can master it.

primary.name: M4X Rifle
primary.tooltip: The M4X Rifle is a balanced weapon overall, offering high rate of fire with moderate stopping power.

primary.name: Tactical Assault Rifle
primary.tooltip: The Tactical Assault Rifle is a very stable weapon, with a lower rate of fire, increased accuracy, and improved stopping power.

primary.name: Assault Rifle
primary.tooltip: The Assault Rifle is a balanced weapon overall, offering a high rate of fire with moderate stopping power.

primary.name: Bolt-Action Rifle
primary.tooltip: The Bolt-Action Rifle is an extremely long-range, extremely powerful weapon, but a new bullet must be loaded into the chamber after each shot.

primary.name: Light Machine Gun
primary.tooltip: The Light Machine Gun has a high ammo capacity, but sacrifices accuracy for the sheer volume of bullets.

primary.name: Burstfire Rifle
primary.tooltip: The Burstfire Rifle fires quick bursts of three bullets, with a tight spread.

primary.name: Prestige Assault Rifle
primary.tooltip: The Assault Rifle is a balanced weapon overall, offering a high rate of fire with moderate stopping power.

primary.name: Submachine Gun
primary.tooltip: The SMG is an extremely fast automatic weapon, though the individual bullets don't pack much punch.

primary.name: Combat Rifle
primary.tooltip: The Combat Rifle is an extremely long-range semi-automatic weapon with moderate stopping power.

primary.name: Light Recon Rifle
primary.tooltip: The Light Recon Rifle is a short to medium range semi-automatic weapon with good stability.

secondary.name: Shotgun AR-k
secondary.tooltip: The Shotgun Assault Rifle-k offers a high rate of fire but is highly inaccurate at a distance.

secondary.name: Breech Loaded Pistol
secondary.tooltip: The Breech Loaded Pistol that can be bored to use exotic ammuniation.

secondary.name: Snub 260
secondary.tooltip: A compact snubnose revolver with a higher rate of fire but less punch than larger revolvers.

secondary.name: Heavy Pistol
secondary.tooltip: The Heavy Pistol is surprisingly powerful for a weapon of its size, but has a high recoil.

secondary.name: Light Pistol
secondary.tooltip: The Light Pistol is a standard-issue firearm, with high firerate and accuracy but low damage.

secondary.name: Burstfire Pistol
secondary.tooltip: The Burstfire Pistol fires quick bursts of three bullets. It is extremely light and fast, but suffers from high recoil and poor accuracy.

secondary.name: Prestige Light Pistol
secondary.tooltip: The Light Pistol is a standard-issue firearm, with high firerate and accuracy but low damage.

secondary.name: Machine Pistol
secondary.tooltip: The Machine Pistol fires a continuous stream of bullets, but has a high recoil and poor accuracy.

secondary.name: Revolver
secondary.tooltip: The Revolver is exceptionally powerful with a decent range, but is very slow and holds only six bullets at a time.

secondary.name: Shotgun
secondary.tooltip: The Shotgun sprays damaging pellets at nearby targets. It's very slow, but extremely effective at close range.
